---
title: GitHub Releases
nav_title: Releases
description: |
  GitHub releases are a construct unique to GitHub and not an actual part of Git
---

<Note type="warning" fill>
  This section is under construction.
</Note>

# Customizing Auto-generated Release Notes

https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/releasing-projects-on-github/automatically-generated-release-notes

> **Note**: `.github/release.yml` is a special GitHub file.

```yml filename=".github/release.yml" showLineNumbers
changelog:
  exclude:
    labels:
      - ignore-for-release
    authors:
      - octocat
  categories:
    - title: Breaking Changes ðŸ› 
      labels:
        - Semver-Major
        - breaking-change
    - title: Exciting New Features ðŸŽ‰
      labels:
        - Semver-Minor
        - enhancement
    - title: Other Changes
      labels:
        - "*"
```
